name: Pit of whatever fell in there
name_original: Pit of whatever fell in there
description:
Description:

This is a console (meaning text-only) game I managed to whip up in about 2 weeks or more. It's not special in any way and it's meant to be a short little thing you pick up and play. This project started, as always, with me being bored. Since I wasn't home and couldn't work on other stuff, I decided to test my programming skills by making a short little console turn-based RPG, nothing more, nothing less. And here we are...

Story:

Story? What story?! You're just a little wizard guy who got thrown in a pit full of other angry wizards, you call that a story?

Controls:

As I said, it's small, so don't expect crazy amounts of controls. You only need ARROW KEYS and ENTER. Also ESCAPE if you want to exit out of the game, but you will have to start from the beginning.

Download & instructions:

It's down there, look! Also, in order to open the game, you will only need to click the executable/application file, and nothing else.
